text: The store is awesome and the staff are super friendly. The Brazilian guy, Jonathan helps me a lot to find the right gift for my son. Thanks a lot.

The people there were very helpful with everything and also on the phone! I had bought my Real Madrid jersey from another store, but there was no letter to stick on the back of the jersey. So with just one small phone call I spoke to this business and got it done quickly! Thank you guys!!

I've been to many other Adidas stores, but I've never seen that product before, so I'm very satisfied.

An ordinary Adidas in Nuremberg. Adult items are 110 euros, children's shoes are 55 euros. There is an outlet nearby and these shoes are 30 euros, 10 euros. So, if you have a vehicle, you can go to the outlet anyway.
The staff is very friendly and I have always bought Adidas products because of their texture and quality. I really like it.

Was just there, wanted to buy some shoes. No one else in the store, but 3 salespeople, 2 of whom were busy with their cell phones and the 3rd preferred to sort clothes rather than ask customers about their shoe size. I left without buying ‚Ä¶

Very helpful and friendly staff, very good advice. The selection is not as large as in the store in Herzogenaurach, but it is certainly sufficient. Despite it being Saturday afternoon, we didn't have to wait at all and were given extensive advice and support.

Great store, good advice, uncomplicated and little waiting time. Water dispenser available, the only thing that annoyed me a bit is that the salespeople were apparently instructed to get customers to sign up for a newsletter and/or an app... that doesn't have to be the case, otherwise the store is pretty great.
